roleset.name: move like a snake
roleset.note: WRITHE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'writhe' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 47.3, 40.6, Framenet entry Body movement. (from writhe.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: Suddenly the woman begins swaying and then writhing .
